Name: Campbelltown City Library, Local Studies Collection

About.Hours & facilities: Open during library hours Monday to Friday from 9.30am-8.30pm, Saturday 9am-4pm and Sunday from 10.30am-4pm

About.Access: Access to Council files requires written approval from Council's Public Officer. Rest of collection is freely available.

About.Acquisition focus: Any materials, primarily printed, relating to Campbelltown Local Government area.

Contact.Street address: Corner Hurley Street and Camden Road, Campbelltown 2560
